snippet: State officials expect to present Detroit leaders with a proposed consent agreement on Tuesday aimed at saving the city from fiscal ruin, a spokeswoman for Gov. Rick Snyder said Monday.
abstract: Michigan state officials expect to present Detroit leaders with a proposed consent agreement aimed at saving the city from fiscal ruin.
lead_paragraph: State officials expect to present Detroit leaders with a proposed consent agreement on Tuesday aimed at saving the city from fiscal ruin, a spokeswoman for Gov. Rick Snyder said Monday.

headline.seo: Michigan: State to Present Fiscal Agreement to Detroit
headline.main: Michigan: Detroit May Avoid Imposition of Outside Manager
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Detroit May Avoid Imposition of Outside Manager
